p: A mixture of N-(3,4,5-trimethoxybenzoyl)glycine (0.30 g, 1.10 mmol) and the appropriate aldehydes 8a–h (1.00 mmol) in acetic anhydride (1 ml) and fused sodium acetate (0.1 g, 1.2 mmol) was heated on an oil bath at 80 °C for 2 h. After cooling down at room temperature the mixture was allowed to stand for 24 h at 0 °C. The precipitate was filtered off and washed three times with ice-cooled ethanol (10 ml), and the product crystallised from ethanol.
